item.title: Prenatal HIV Exposure May Affect Puberty Onset Time
item.description: A higher maternal HIV load in pregnancy is linked toward earlier onset of puberty in HIV-exposed and uninfected boys but not girls. Medscape Medical N...

item.title: Antipsychotic Use Surges Among Older US Adults
item.description: Antipsychotic use in older adults in the US soared from 2015 to 2024, with a growing share coming from long-term care pharmacies and not psychiatrists...
